channel.title: iOS-Factor: A methodology for building high-quality iOS apps on a solid architecture on heapcon ⬣ a new conference by heapspace
channel.description: Recent content in iOS-Factor: A methodology for building high-quality iOS apps on a solid architecture on heapcon ⬣ a new conference by heapspace

item.title: Felix Krause
item.description: Felix is the creator of fastlane, an open source toolset for automating all your iOS and Android development tasks. He joined Twitter in 2015, and recently started working at Google, where he now works full-time on open source tooling for mobile app developers. Before that Felix worked at various startups in Europe and in the U.S. where he collected over 6 years of experience in the iOS ecosystem.
